review: Good idea. Tends to slip on the strings however. Convenientt to have a pick at the end of the neck.
Very good tuner and I love that it attached to the instrument and you can leave it there. I wholeheartedly endorse the product.

Love the Snark SN-2. Works well on my bass, and does a beautiful job on both acoustic and electric guitars. Tight tuning and easily used. Very good product overall, not to mention the reasonable price.Buy it.

I own a number of guitar hangers. This one was a good buy for the money. I have wood ones that are heavier and more attractive, but also a good deal pricier. For what I spent for this one, it is adequate as long as it "holds Up" (Pun intended)
A little small for my taste, very thin, but works well and Dunlop products have always peased me as a professional musician.
